channel.title: Research assistant on Laura Montenbruck
channel.description: Recent content in Research assistant on Laura Montenbruck

item.description: 2020- University of Mannheim, Prof. Michèle Tertilt, PhD 2019-2020 Center for Evaluation and Development (C4ED), PD Dr. Alexandra Avdeenko 2018 Innovations for Poverty Action (IPA), Prof. Christopher Udry, PhD 2017 University of Göttingen, Department of Agricultural Economics and Rural Development, Dr. Esther Gehrke 2016-2017 RWI Leibniz-Institut für Wirtschaftsforschung, Prof. Dr. Jörg Ankel-Peters 2016 United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America and the Caribbean, Birgit Fain (née Altmann)
